title: Special Topics in Game Design
description: Allows students to explore game designs related to their ongoing work within their major in either digital or non-digital formats. Students choose a topic and develop game projects that engage players. May be repeated for credit.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: art & design: games and playable media and computer science: computer game design majors.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ARTG 80G,and ARTG 80I. Enrollment is restricted to art & design: games and playable media and computer science: computer game design majors.
